divs: sighting detailson decking noticed light moving and pulsating, called partner who also obseved object thought it could be satellite at first but object pulsated - white on edges, gold\blue and orange within object changing to solid white when making extreme right hand turn and changing shape from circular to oval, appeared to decent towards melbourne direction. object then accelerated hard and lost sight behind ridge of trees object made no sound.
Summary: bright object making extreme right hand turn and changing colour Ocean Grove Victoria Australia
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Geelong
There were no other sightings in Geelong on or around March 12th 2012
